sentences.sContent: A colloid of life is the unknown factor between the animate and the inanimate." (Jubbs Cell Rejuvenation, p.14.)
sentences.sContent_eng: A colloid of life is the unknown factor between the animate and the inanimate." (Jubbs Cell Rejuvenation, p.14.)
sentences.sCn: 生命胶质是介于生命体和非生命体的未知介质。

sentences.sContent: Natural protein, soluble in water and most commonly found in the Albumins, the colloid used for certain dichromated sensitizes employed in photomechanical process.
sentences.sContent_eng: Natural protein, soluble in water and most commonly found in the Albumins, the colloid used for certain dichromated sensitizes employed in photomechanical process.
sentences.sCn: 是一种天然蛋白质，可溶于水，在蛋白中最为常见。这种胶质在照相制版法里用以作重铬酸盐感光剂。

sentences.sContent: Its high shear colloid mill with particular intermeshing design offers a quick and efficient asphalt production, having been given the name of “SUPER MILL” as praise.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its high shear colloid mill with particular intermeshing design offers a quick and efficient asphalt production, having been given the name of “SUPER MILL” as praise.
sentences.sCn: 其独特的高剪切胶体磨生产沥青迅速而且高效，在业内获得了“超级磨”的美名。

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the gluelike translucent material found in certain degenerating tissues
a mixture having particles of one component, with diameters between 10–7 and 10–9 metres, suspended in a continuous phase of another component
